ygData.subject: Hiya
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello there !     My name is Erica. It is a pleasure to meet you all .I play 31  wood elf warrior named Kilara Silkenwhisper on the Karana server.I look
ygData.messageBody:
Hello there ! My name is Erica. It is a pleasure to meet you all .I
play 31 wood elf warrior named Kilara Silkenwhisper on the Karana
server.I look forward to talking with you all and having fun in game and
sharing tips on items, leveling and such<smile>.If you would like some
tips or just some friendly chat I am here <smiles>In game I mostly
roleplay as if this is my world this is what I know.This is a nice
mailing list I am glad I found it.

P.S
I do enjoy playing a warrior in midevial ages. ;) Something
none of us can do in real life.It is without a doubt my great
escape.<smiles>
